about.description: THE TALK is the podcast that takes you behind the scenes of fashion. Mijean Rochus, professional model, shares exclusive conversations with designers, stylists, photographers and creatives shaping the fashion industry. From haute couture runways to emerging trends, discover the untold stories behind the glamour.
